thread.title: Digital Realty Trust reports 2Q results

title: Digital Realty Trust reports 2Q results
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Jul 30, 2015, 22:57 BST - UK Markets closed Digital Realty Trust reports 2Q results Digital Realty Trust posts 2Q FFO of $176.1 million, results top expectations Associated Press â€“ 11 minutes ago 64.64 -0.14 
SAN FRANCISCO (AP) _ Digital Realty Trust Inc. (DLR) on Thursday reported a key measure of profitability in its second quarter. The results topped Wall Street expectations. 
The real estate investment trust, based in San Francisco, said it had funds from operations of $176.1 million, or $1.26 per share, in the period. 
The average estimate of nine analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of $1.25 per share. 
Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry. It takes net income and adds back items such as depreciation and amortization. 
The company said it had net income of $117.1 million, or 86 cents per share. 
The real estate investment trust posted revenue of $418.2 million in the period, which also beat Street forecasts. Six analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $410.2 million. 
Digital Realty Trust expects full-year funds from operations to be $5.33 to $5.43 per share. 
The company's shares have dropped 2.5 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, shares hit $64.64, decreasing slightly in the last 12 months. 

This story was generated by Automated Insights (http://automatedinsights.com/ap) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on DLR at http://www.zacks.com/ap/DLR
